trans-unit.source: Provides HTTP content based on a byte array.
trans-unit.target: 提供基于字节数组的 HTTP 内容。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.ByteArrayContent" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.ByteArrayContent" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The content used to initialize the <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.ByteArrayContent" />.
trans-unit.target: 用于初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.ByteArrayContent" /> 的内容。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.ByteArrayContent" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.ByteArrayContent" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="content" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="content" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The content used to initialize the <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.ByteArrayContent" />.
trans-unit.target: 用于初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.ByteArrayContent" /> 的内容。

trans-unit.source: The offset, in bytes, in the <c>content</c> parameter used to initialize the <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.ByteArrayContent" />.
trans-unit.target: <c>content</c> 参数中用于初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.ByteArrayContent" /> 的偏移量（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes in the <c>content</c> starting from the <c>offset</c> parameter used to initialize the <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.ByteArrayContent" />.
trans-unit.target: <c>content</c> 中从用于初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.ByteArrayContent" /> 的 <c>offset</c> 参数开始的字节数。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.ByteArrayContent" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.ByteArrayContent" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Only the range specified by the `offset` parameter and the `count` parameter is used as content.
trans-unit.target: 仅指定的范围`offset`参数和`count`参数用作内容。

trans-unit.source: Syntax
trans-unit.target: 语法

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="content" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="content" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="offset" /> parameter is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 参数小于零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="offset" /> parameter is greater than the length of content specified by the <paramref name="content" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 参数大于 <paramref name="content" /> 参数指定的内容的长度。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="count" /> parameter is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="count" /> 参数小于零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="count" /> parameter is greater than the length of content specified by the <paramref name="content" /> parameter - minus the <paramref name="offset" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="count" /> 参数大于由 <paramref name="content" /> 参数减去 <paramref name="offset" /> 参数所指定的内容长度。

trans-unit.source: Creates an HTTP content stream as an asynchronous operation for reading whose backing store is memory from the <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.ByteArrayContent" />.
trans-unit.target: 异步创建 HTTP 内容流，用于读取哪一个对象的后备存储是 <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.ByteArrayContent" /> 的内存。

trans-unit.source: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示异步操作的任务对象。

trans-unit.source: This operation will not block.
trans-unit.target: 不会阻止此操作。

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> object will complete after all of the content stream has been created.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601>对象将完成创建内容流的所有后。

trans-unit.source: The target stream.
trans-unit.target: 目标流。

trans-unit.source: Information about the transport, like channel binding token.
trans-unit.target: 有关传输的信息，例如通道绑定令牌。

trans-unit.source: This parameter may be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 此参数可以为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Serialize and write the byte array provided in the constructor to an HTTP content stream as an asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 作为一个异步操作，将构造函数中提供的字节数组序列化并写入一个 HTTP 内容流。

trans-unit.source: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示异步操作的任务对象。

trans-unit.source: This operation does not block.
trans-unit.target: 此操作不会阻止。

trans-unit.source: When the returned <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> object completes, the whole byte array has been written to the `stream` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 当返回<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>对象完成，整个字节数组已写入到`stream`参数。

trans-unit.source: The length in bytes of the byte array.
trans-unit.target: 字节数组的长度（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a byte array has a valid length in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 确定字节数组的长度是否有效（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="length" /> is a valid length; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="length" /> 是有效长度，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Http.ByteArrayContent.TryComputeLength%2A> method gives a derived content type the ability to calculate the content length.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Http.ByteArrayContent.TryComputeLength%2A>方法，派生的内容类型将能够进行计算的内容长度。

trans-unit.source: This is useful for content types which are able to easily calculate the content length.
trans-unit.target: 这可用于内容类型，它们是能够轻松地计算出的内容长度。

trans-unit.source: If computing the content length is not possible or expensive (would require the system to buffer the whole content where the serialization would be expensive or require the system to allocate a lot of memory), this method can return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果计算内容的长度不能或昂贵 （需要系统的数据进行缓冲整个内容序列化将的成本要高或需要系统分配的大量的内存位置），此方法可以返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: If this method returns `false`, this implies that either chunked transfer is needed or the content must get buffered before being sent to the server.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法返回`false`，这意味着，需要分块的传输或者是必须发送到服务器之前缓冲内容。

trans-unit.source: This method always returned `true` for <xref:System.Net.Http.ByteArrayContent>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法始终返回`true`为<xref:System.Net.Http.ByteArrayContent>。
